item.title: The Algorithm Built to Fail
item.description: This is my entry for 3blue1brown’s first summer of math exposition (SoME1) There’s no question that elliptic curves are incredibly important to math and cryptography. ECC spotted in Wikipedia’s security certificate It was the key to Andrew Wiles’s famous proof of Fermat’s Last Theorem. It was even used to fill a void in one of M. C. Escher’s artworks.
